tooltips.edit_project_tooltip: To edit project you should select one Active project.
tooltips.share_project_tooltip: To share project you should select at least one Active not Shared project.
tooltips.unshare_project_tooltip: To unshare project you should select at least one Active Shared project.
tooltips.deactivate_project_tooltip: To deactivate project you should select at least one Active project.
tooltips.activate_project_tooltip: To activate project you should select at least one Inactive project.

errors.view_not_shared_proj: This project was not shared to view!

options_tip.N: N - side of the square of the model (must be a multiple of D)
options_tip.R: R - = 1 reflection from the boundaries, = 0 - absorption by boundaries
options_tip.OMEGA: OMEGA - the frequency of the new oscillator (from 0.001 to 0.1)

options_tip_1d.N: N - side of the square of the model
options_tip_1d.Km: Km - modulus of elasticity / mass of a node (from 0.1 to 1)
options_tip_1d.OMEGA: OMEGA - the frequency of the oscillator

landing.visualize: Visualize the phenomena of absorption, reflection, diffraction and interference
landing.change_params_text: Change the basic parameters of wave propagation and look at the result
landing.save_projects_text: Save, share and manipulate your own projects
landing.about_text: Software system that allows to simulate the propagation of waves in a closed space and their interaction with barriers, visualize the phenomena of absorption, reflection, diffraction and interference, provides the ability to change the basic parameters of wave propagation, the ability to create projects and store their configuration.
landing.well_for_study: It is well suited for studying materials for students in schools and universities.
landing.service: Web service for waves modelling in a closed space.
landing.use_service: Use service as unregistered user with access to waves modelling.
landing.authorize: Authorize and get an opportunity to save configured model as a project.
